trans-unit.source: Specifies when the visual style selects a different multiple-image file to draw an element.
trans-unit.target: 指定視覺化樣式選取不同的多重影像檔案來繪製項目的時機。

trans-unit.source: A visual style can define up to five multiple-image files for an element.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式可以定義的項目最多五個的多個映像檔案。

trans-unit.source: These image files are specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty> values <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile5>.
trans-unit.target: 這些映像檔案所指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1>透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile5>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType> values indicate when the visual style selects a different image file to draw the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType>值，表示視覺化樣式時選取不同的影像檔，以繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType> values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.ImageSelectType?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType>值代表的傳回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫的引數值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.ImageSelectType?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Image file changes are based on dots per inch (DPI) settings.
trans-unit.target: 影像檔的變更是根據 Dots Per Inch (DPI) 設定。

trans-unit.source: The image file does not change.
Image file changes are based on size settings.
trans-unit.target: 影像檔的變更是根據大小設定。
